Linear algebra
===============

Currently, cytnx supports the following linear algebra functions:

+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|    func      |  inplace  | CPU | GPU  | callby tn   | Tn | CyTn (xlinalg) |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Add         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Sub         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Mul         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Div         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Cpr         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   x            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  +,+=[tn]    |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  -,-=[tn]    |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  *,*=[tn]    |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  /,/=[tn]    |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  ==[tn]      |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   x            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Svd         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| *Svd_truncate|   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    N        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  InvM        |   InvM_   |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Inv         |   Inv _   |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Conj        |   Conj_   |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Exp         |   Exp_    |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Expf        |   Expf_   |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Eigh        |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| *ExpH        |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    N        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| *ExpM        |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    N        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Matmul      |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Diag        |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| `a`_Tensordot|   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Outer       |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Vectordot   |   x       |  Y  | .Y   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Tridiag      |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Kron         |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Norm         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   N            | 
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| *Dot         |   x       |  Y  |  Y   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Eig          |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Pow          |   Pow_    |  Y  |  Y   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Abs          |   Abs_    |  Y  |  N   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| QR           |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    N        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Det          |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    N        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| Min          |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
|  Max         |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    Y        | Y  |   N            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+
| *Trace       |   x       |  Y  |  N   |    Y        | Y  |   Y            |
+--------------+-----------+-----+------+-------------+----+----------------+

.. _a:
* this is a high level linalg

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 3
